Text: PowerHighwaycomPST PowerHighwaycom Newsletter Job Seekers Are you an energy industry job seeker who wants to find a better career position Hello I am Matt Richards President of Powerhighwaycom Powerhighwaycom is an Internet job board that brings you energy industry jobs We have recently joined the Energy Jobs Network EJN allowing us to offer you job opportunities from different industry sectors We decided to partner with EJN because it gives our members direct access to the entire EJN jobs database and gives us a steady stream of new job postings every day Therefore if you are an applicant looking for a new career position in the energy industry Powerhighwaycom will help you quickly find what you need Registration on Powerhighwaycom is an easy threestep process that should take less than five minutes Once your registration is completed you will be taken to your personal home page my desk where you will be able to access all of your information and manage your search process This simple registration process will allow you to find your ideal job without having to wade through a list of nonenergy related positions Privacy is a very important issue when you are jobhunting because you dont want your resume to show up on your bosses desk With our new job board your level of privacy is your choice with an option to control all of your personal information Our services are free to job seekers with no hidden costs or obligations Why not visit us today and let us help you find your dream job rhighwaycom Energy Industry Employers PowerHighwaycom has recently partnered with Energy Jobs Network EJN the premier job board application service provider in the energy sector Through our partnership with EJN your job listings now reach a rapidly increasing percentage of energy sector professionalsthe pool of applicants most likely to meet your specific needs Through EJN your job listings on PowerHighwaycom will now appear on all of the job boards within the Energy Jobs Network This means that as EJN grows the exposure of your job listings on PowerHighwaycom job board will increase automatically Current Energy Job Network members include the following energy associations CEA Canadian Electricity Associatio n IPAA Independent Petroleum Association of America IPAMS Independent Petroleum Association of the Mountain States with two new associations launching their energy job boards in the next days NESA HEA National Energy Services Association Houston Energy Association g NGEAO Natural Gas Energy Association of Oklahoma These partnerships are typical with many more energy sector trade groups associations and media publishers scheduled to partner with EJN in the coming weeks bringing thousands of additional energy sector specialists into the EJN system every month FREE Job Postings For a limited time only we are offering employers a special promotional offer Our day trial period will give you up to free job postings a value No hidden costs and no obligations This offer is available on to first time users only Post your Jobs One Time Pay One Rate and Receive Worldwide Exposure Matt Richards President PowerHighwaycom or PHIGHWY Please email us to be taken off our newsletter list
